property.name: jpaQuery
property.value: SELECT CONCAT(cf.originator.person.givenName, ' ', cf.originator.person.familyName), pi.identificationNumber, CASE WHEN ms.milestoneDate IS NULL THEN CURRENT_DATE ELSE ms.milestoneDate END FROM CaseFile cf LEFT OUTER JOIN cf.originator.person.personIdentification pi ON pi.identificationType = 'EMPLOYEE_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN cf.milestones ms ON ms.milestoneName = 'Adjudicated' WHERE cf.id = ?1
